attractions.name: Historic City Hall
attractions.description: Built in 1895, our beautiful City Hall stands as a testament to Victorian architecture. The building features stunning stained glass windows and hosts regular tours showcasing the city's rich governmental history.

attractions.name: Riverside Park
attractions.description: A 50-acre urban oasis featuring walking trails, playgrounds, picnic areas, and stunning river views. Perfect for families, joggers, and nature enthusiasts year-round.

attractions.name: Community Arts Center
attractions.description: Experience local and international art exhibitions, live performances, and creative workshops. The center hosts monthly First Friday events featuring local artists and musicians.

attractions.name: Farmers Market Plaza
attractions.description: Every Saturday from May to October, local farmers and artisans gather to offer fresh produce, handcrafted goods, and delicious prepared foods. A true community gathering place.

attractions.name: Heritage Museum
attractions.description: Discover our region's fascinating past through interactive exhibits, historical artifacts, and engaging storytelling. Special exhibits change quarterly, ensuring something new with every visit.

attractions.name: Downtown Theater
attractions.description: A beautifully restored 1920s theater offering live performances, classic films, and community events. The theater's art deco interior provides an elegant backdrop for entertainment.

attractions.name: Lakeside Trail
attractions.description: This scenic 5-mile paved trail circles the lake, offering breathtaking views and wildlife watching opportunities. Popular with cyclists, walkers, and runners of all fitness levels.

attractions.name: Innovation Technology Hub
attractions.description: A state-of-the-art facility supporting local startups and entrepreneurs. Features coworking spaces, meeting rooms, and hosts regular networking events and tech workshops.
